scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 main.py
scripts.dev:scheduler: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 scheduler.py
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:scheduler"
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/ -v
